entry.summary:
Less than 23 hours left in the @Mailchain_xyz hackathon. Don't forget to submit your projects 👇 https://twitter.com/developer_dao/status/1645631152458469376
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 𝐇𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐫𝐬 about 3 more days left for the D_D x Mailchain Hackathon. Submissions are due by 𝟖 𝐩𝐦 𝐔𝐓𝐂 𝐨𝐧 𝟏𝟒𝐭𝐡 𝐀𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐥 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟑 Prize Bounty: 1800 USDC prize pool Developer Components 🥇 600 USDC 🥈 400 USDC 🥉 200 USDC Prize Bounty 2: Developer Tutorial… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1645631152458469376
